# attendees

**Instance Property**

The attendees associated with the calendar item, as an array of [doc://com.apple.eventkit/documentation/EventKit/EKParticipant] objects.

## Declaration

```swift
var attendees: [EKParticipant]? { get }
```

## Discussion

This property is read-only; it is not possible to add attendees with Event Kit. This property is `nil` if the calendar item has no attendees.

## Displaying Attendees

- **hasAttendees**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the calendar item has attendees.
